:seconds.description: The number of seconds required for the countdown

startText.description: See above for the prompts before you begin
startText.description_zh: 开始前的提示语，见上方说明

changeText.description: Prompts during the countdown must have the letter "x", as described above
changeText.description_zh: 倒计时期间的提示语，必须带有字母"x"，见上方说明

endText.description: The reminder of the end of the countdown is described above
endText.description_zh: 倒计结束的提示语，见上方说明

keepRunning.description: Whether to continue the countdown when H5 is refreshed or when each end returns to re-enter
keepRunning.description_zh: 是否在H5刷新或各端返回再进入时继续倒计时

uniqueKey.description: The distinguishing key for continuing the countdown between multiple components is described above
uniqueKey.description_zh: 多个组件之间继续倒计时的区分key，见上方说明

events.name: change
events.description: During the countdown, it is triggered once per second
events.description_zh: 倒计时期间，每秒触发一次
events.params: text: 当前剩余多少秒的状态，见上方说明
